parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description:
The sender address.

> If you leave this parameter empty, data for all addresses is returned. This parameter is required if you specify TagName.

parameters.name: DedicatedIp
parameters.description:
The dedicated IP address. This parameter is available only for users of dedicated IPs.

If you do not specify this parameter, data for all IPs is returned.

parameters.name: DedicatedIpPoolId
parameters.description:
The ID of the dedicated IP pool. This parameter is available only for users of dedicated IPs.

If you do not specify this parameter, data for all IP pools is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time. The time span between the start time and end time cannot exceed 15 days. The format is yyyy-MM-dd.

parameters.name: Esp
parameters.description:
The Email Service Provider (ESP). This parameter is available only for users of dedicated IPs. Valid values:

- gmail.com

- yahoo.com

- outlook.com

- icloud.com

- others (data for ESPs other than the ones listed above)

If you do not specify this parameter, data for all ESPs is returned.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: The value is 0 for the first query and 1 for subsequent queries. A value of 1 indicates a paged query in chronological order. (This field is deprecated)

parameters.name: OffsetCreateTime
parameters.description: Used for paging. Do not set this parameter for the first query. For subsequent queries, set this parameter to the OffsetCreateTime value from the previous response. (This field is deprecated)

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time. The time cannot be earlier than 30 days ago. The format is yyyy-MM-dd.

parameters.name: TagName
parameters.description: The email tag. If you leave this parameter empty, data for all tags is returned.
